home.hero_sub: Detect, monitor, and prevent water-borne disease outbreaks.

features.alerts_desc: Notify authorities and communities instantly when risks emerge.
features.reports_desc: Collect multilingual symptom reports from the field.
features.iot_desc: Stream sensor data like turbidity and pH securely.
features.ai_desc: Predict outbreaks using health and environmental signals.

home.why_desc: From clinics to communities, we help detect and respond to water-borne risks faster.
